resources.string: Sites viewed in private tabs are not displayed in your Qwant history, and their cookies are always deleted when you close the tab. Without private browsing, your search history is stored on your phone but is not visible to Qwant (we respect your privacy!).

Please be aware that private browsing does not make you invisible on the Internet. Private tabs do not prevent your mobile operator or Wi-Fi network owner tracking the sites you visit or your public IP address.
